item.title: Modal editing, the superior way of editing
item.description: Well ok, I might have exagerated. I actually don’t care what text editor you use, just use the one you feel most comfortable with. What I really want to transmit with this text is that there are more ways to edit text than the traditional way, the one most people use when they learn how to use a computer. I don’t want to make anyone feel bad with this post.
